DOC.brief_summary: Comparing nifedipine to placebo for the maintenance tocolysis of preterm labor
DOC.brief_title: Nifedipine vs Placebo for Maintenance Tocolysis of Preterm Labor.
DOC.detailed_description: To estimate whether maintenance nifedipine tocolysis after arrested preterm labor prolongs pregnancy and improves neonatal outcomes.
DOC.criteria: arrested preterm labor ruptured membranes, fetal distress, placenta previa, placental abruption, maternal medical contraindication to tocolysis
